text:
The StringManager class attempts to set the Locale by calling the 
ResourceBundle.getLocale method.  When using JDK 1.1.x, this causes Tomcat to 
fail, since this method is only since 1.2.
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
It looks like the only reasonable miminal target would be J2ME (and, even that 
will require work :).
